org.carat20.client

Class Carat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cordova.CordovaPlugin
      • org.carat20.client.Carat

  • public class Carat
extends org.apache.cordova.CordovaPlugin
    This class acts as the middleware between Phonegap and native functions of Carat. It contains methods necessary for calling the code from Javascript, initializing the background process, refreshing/fetching data and providing the requested data.

    Class and method snippets are based on the work by original author Eemil Lagerspetz

    See Also:
    CommunicationManager, DataStorage

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public boolean execute(java.lang.String action,
                       org.json.JSONArray args,
                       org.apache.cordova.CallbackContext callbackContext)
                throws org.json.JSONException
        Provides an interface for cordova exec which accepts data requests and fulfills them by either utilizing the server or local storage. Callbacks are mostly used for passing reports to globally accessible Javascript objects.
        Overrides:
        execute in class org.apache.cordova.CordovaPlugin
        Parameters:
        action - Determines the function call.
        args - Optional information about the request, e.g. events.
        callbackContext - Used for returning data to callback functions.
        Returns:
        State boolean, which is true if an action gets executed.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - In case the JSONArray used for args is invalid.

      • getJscore

        public static int getJscore()
        Makes a storage call to get main reports from which a JScore is extracted. We must make sure the background process has finished so that reports don't get called as null.
        Returns:
        JScore, the original value from server multiplied by 100.

      • getHogBugs

        public static java.lang.String getHogBugs()
        Makes a storage call to get reports from which Hog and Bug reports are extracted. We must make sure the background process has finished so that reports don't get called as null.
        Returns:
        HogBugReport converted to String format.
